preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 56.00 g of chromium (Cr). 
 2. Weigh out 128.00 g of oxygen (O). 
 3. Weigh out 30.97 g of phosphorus (P). 
 4. Weigh out 87.62 g of strontium (Sr). 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all ingredients thoroughly using a mortar and pestle for uniformity.
